name: SpaceDweller
description: SpaceDweller is a turn based game where you have to fight against the Empire that attacked your sector. Explore various star systems, upgrade your ship and destroy your enemies. Combine modules and satellites in a multitude of ways each with unique abilities to gain an advantage in battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
